comments:
MAC OSX 10.2.6
Eclipse: 200309170800

When doing option shift f to format the code I got the stack below. The editor became unusable and I 
couldn't close it - I had to quit eclipse and restart it. Its the second time its happened for me but I 
cannot tell you anything else I was doing other than formatting code.
